messages.title: Final Brexit Deal
messages.content: TIM FARRON'S LIB DEMS WILL GIVE YOU A SAY ON THE FINAL BREXIT DEAL.

messages.title: Labour Can't Win
messages.content: EVERYONE KNOWS LABOUR CAN'T WIN THIS TIME. VOTE LIB DEM TO CHANGE BRITAIN'S FUTURE.

messages.title: Poisoned Apple
messages.content: IF HER FINAL BREXIT DEAL IS A POISONED APPLE... WHY SHOULD YOU HAVE TO EAT IT?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only the Lib Dems can stop a hard Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: Only the Lib Dems can stop a hard Brexit.

endorsements.endorsement: The Lib Dems... have vowed to fight us every step of the way.
All the things that I've been banging on about for the last 20 years have now been adopted wholesale by Theresa May.

quotes.text: Only the Lib Dems can stop a hard Brexit.
